fields.contents: When selecting a technology for my blog I realized I could've gone with anything out there - wordpress, drupal, etc. However being a true python fan, I figured I really had to create the blog in django. So I set out on this journey, to figure out django and create this blog.
fields.title: Selecting a technology for my blog

fields.contents: I've realized that Python makes me extremely productive. Any small proof of concept that i have to do (non-GUI), can be written in python in a matter of minutes. I think back and realize that i've never been this productive before with any language even basic!
fields.title: Python is so Productive!!

fields.contents: I have been working with VSS most of my life. When i was introduced to the concept of subversion and the concept of merging changes I was excited. However now seeing Git, i'm even more amazed. Version control has evolved a lot the last couple of years and it seems to keep getting better.
fields.title: Git or Sub Version

fields.contents: The more I understand Heroku, the more I like it. It seems to be easy to use and fast. It pretty much allows you to execute anything python in the cloud. It truly is an amazing cloud solution.
fields.title: Deploying on Heroku
